titleStmt.title: A confession of faith of James Salgado, a Spaniard, and sometimes a priest in the Church of Rome dedicated to the University of Oxford : with an account of his life and sufferings by the Romish party, since he forsook the Romish religion.
titleStmt.author: Salgado, James, fl. 1680.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
